1, square=1, 1+0=1
9, square=81, 1+8=9
45, square=2025, 25+20=45
55, square=3025, 25+30=55
99, square=9801, 01+98=99
297, square=88209, 209+88=297
703, square=494209, 209+494=703
999, square=998001, 001+998=999

5050, square=25502500, 2500+2550=5050
